argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prds1.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 2 |  | prds1.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 3 |  | prds1.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 4 |  | prds1.r | |- ( ph -> R : I --> Ring ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) = ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mgpf | |- ( mulGrp |` Ring ) : Ring --> Mnd |
| 7 |  | #P_fco2 | |- ( ( ( mulGrp |` Ring ) : Ring --> Mnd /\ R : I --> Ring ) -> ( mulGrp o. R ) : I --> Mnd ) |
| 8 | 6, 4, 7 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ph -> ( mulGrp o. R ) : I --> Mnd ) |
| 9 | 5, 2, 3, 8 | #P_prds0g | |- ( ph -> ( 0g o. ( mulGrp o. R ) ) = ( 0g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` Y ) = ( mulGrp ` Y ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( R : I --> Ring -> R Fn I ) |
| 13 | 4, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) |
| 14 | 1, 11, 5, 2, 3, 13 | #P_prdsmgp | |- ( ph -> ( ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) /\ ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( Base ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 14 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) y ) ) |
| 18 | 10, 15, 17 | #P_grpidpropd | |- ( ph -> ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) = ( 0g ` ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 9, 18 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( 0g o. ( mulGrp o. R ) ) = ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_df-ur | |- 1r = ( 0g o. mulGrp ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_coeq1i | |- ( 1r o. R ) = ( ( 0g o. mulGrp ) o. R ) |
| 22 |  | #P_coass | |- ( ( 0g o. mulGrp ) o. R ) = ( 0g o. ( mulGrp o. R ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_eqtri | |- ( 1r o. R ) = ( 0g o. ( mulGrp o. R ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` Y ) = ( 1r ` Y ) |
| 25 | 11, 24 | #P_ringidval | |- ( 1r ` Y ) = ( 0g ` ( mulGrp ` Y ) ) |
| 26 | 19, 23, 25 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> ( 1r o. R ) = ( 1r ` Y ) ) |
